meta.description: by Judith Curry I have been contacted by a UK politician about climate policy in the UK, We have a zoom call scheduled for next Thursday to discuss. I know that at least some of the Denizens are from the UK.  So here is a thread where we educate each other and discuss this topic.

title: UK climate policy discussion thread
cleaned_text:
I have been contacted by a UK politician about climate policy in the UK,

We have a zoom call scheduled for next Thursday to discuss.

I know that at least some of the Denizens are from the UK. So here is a thread where we educate each other and discuss this topic.

opengraph.title: UK climate policy discussion thread
